name: Disney+ Recolor Plus
description: Change the colors of Disney+ to your preference! Also there are extra settings you can choose from! I highly recommend using Stylus over Stylish for both Firefox and Chrome and other supported browsers, it's updated more frequently and because that is what i use for my browsers when i create these styles. So for the sake of consistency please consider using Stylus. Here's a link to the add-on: Stylus for Firefox Stylus for Chrome If you're having trouble getting my styles to work or if there's anything else you'd like to ask or inform me of please contact me at Adam-J-Frost@outlook.com. If you would like to help me out, you can donate to me here: Donate via Ko-fi. I hope you like this style and thank you for using it!

user.name: AdamJFrost
user.about: I like making styles for sites i use. I try to keep them up-to-date as much as i can. If you would like to donate and help me out you can use this link to Donate via Ko-fi. Thanks for using my styles and Thanks if you Donated!
